Enclosed are data relative to the Research Cigarette - Alkaloid Series. We plan to make three different alkaloid levels: a low, an intermediate and a high. Since flue-cured high nic (See Item 1 Hogshead 6R) is limiting (542#) and since we want the tobaccos to go as far as possible, we have planned as follows:
